subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After Mike Woodson became the coach of Knicks last spring, he had a candid conversation with Carmelo Anthony, Amar’e Stoudemire and Tyson Chandler about what he expected of them.
snippet: After Mike Woodson became the coach of Knicks last spring, he had a candid conversation with Carmelo Anthony, Amar’e Stoudemire and Tyson Chandler about what he expected of them.
